para.text: This chapter applies to a condom offered for sale or sold by means of a vending machine or other automatic device, and to a vending machine or other automatic device used for selling condoms.
This chapter does not apply to a condom sold person-to-person in a business establishment.

section.heading: Approved Condoms.
section.text: A condom that is approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) as a medical device may be sold or offered for sale by means of a vending machine or other automatic device.

section.heading: Labeling of Product.
section.text: A novelty device which resembles a condom but is not intended for prevention of sexually transmitted diseases or pregnancy and is not FDA approved as a medical device shall be clearly marked: "This item is not intended for prevention of sexually transmitted diseases or pregnancy."

section.heading: Labeling of Vending Machine.
section.text: A vending machine or other automatic device used for selling condoms shall be labeled with the name, address, and telephone number of the person or firm responsible for stocking the machine with condoms.
